rrdworld.name: Oreon
rrdworld.author: Julien Mathis And Romain Le Merlus
rrdworld.description: Oreon is a network supervision software. It is based upon Nagios which is the most effective Open Source supervision and monitoring engine. The aim of this project is to offer a new frontend to Nagios, providing new functionalities through a modern and customisable interface for most users.
